channel.title: "Learn to Play" button no longer working? [1.0.6]
channel.description:
#### What happened?
Clicking the "Learn to Play" button at the top of the main screen makes a noise and highlights, but the tutorial slides do not appear.
#### What was SUPPOSED to happen?
Tutorial slides should appear.
#### Steps to reproduce:
Latest patch, am relatively new player (starting just this week in previous patch) and have played at least 50 games. Button worked when I first started playing and times since then, but has stopped working since latest patch. Playing on 1920x1080 resolution, high quality settings and without a second screen. Have not changed any options since previous patch.
#### Comments:
Have tried reopening game twice. Restarting computer does not solve the problem.

item.title: "Learn to Play" button no longer working? [1.0.6]
item.dc:creator: Navi
item.description:
What happened?

Clicking the “Learn to Play” button at the top of the main screen makes a noise and highlights, but the tutorial slides do not appear.

What was SUPPOSED to happen?

Tutorial slides should appear.

Steps to reproduce:

Latest patch, am relatively new player (starting just this week in previous patch) and have played at least 50 games. Button worked when I first started playing and times since then, but has stopped working since latest patch.
Playing on 1920x1080 resolution, high quality settings and without a second screen. Have not changed any options since previous patch.

Comments:

Have tried reopening game twice. Restarting computer does not solve the problem.
